Comment: #  pitchwheel range in semitones (max=12 is een octave up&down)

Parameter: #         R E V E R B

Comment: # Wet (0-100), implicit dry: package default 33 and 0

Parameter: #         W A H  -  W A H

Comment: # Speed, for LFOwah: speed of the the oscillator 100-1100
# Lvlrange, for LFO+Manualwah: sensitivity (0-100, 0 = filter without wah)

Parameter: #         D E L A Y :   E C H O  /  F L A N G E R

Comment: # Feedback (0-100), amount passed to loop ("next bucket")
# Dry= source volume (0-100). Echo only as flanger sets dry via wet.

Parameter: #         M O O G L A D D E R  (lowpass filter)
#         Out-of-range values can have serious implications

Comment: # filtergain, 10-110. Depends on sound, keep default value <50!

Parameter: #         O V E R D R I V E  (softclip with harmonics filtering)

Comment: # tone: level of low pass filtering: 0-95

Parameter: #         P E A K   L I M I T E R
#         M O D U L A T E

Comment: # Speed (1-32) : 14 ==> 10Hz on saw & block, 5Hz on triangle
# Trill (Off/On): variations are not smooth but in blockform, a kind of yodeling
# amplitude variation 0-100, resulting volume is between full=100 and full-TremDepth
# Trill (Off/On): variations are not smooth but in blockform, a goatlike sound

Parameter: #         C H O R U S

Comment: # Depth: 2-15, level of "unsync/untune" of the voices
# Gain: 30-80, volume of the separate voices

Parameter: #         C H O R D S  ,     S C A L E S
Comment: Do not define both a chord and a scale !

Parameter: #         and    A R P E G G I A T O R

Comment: # Chordname as defined in chords.csv or (single) Note
# Scalename as defined in scales.csv or (single) Note
